H0.text: Life cycles are a characteristic of both plants and animals.

H1.text: Learned behaviors are a characteristic of both plants and animals.

H2.text: Producing their own food is a characteristic of both plants and animals.

H3.text: Reproduce using seeds is a characteristic of both plants and animals.

A4.text: Diplonts include animals, which have life cycles with mitosis occurring only in the diploid phase.
